Class CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.View

extends View
    Command Line Interface to display the View on the terminal

      • displaySelectableOptions

        private void displaySelectableOptions()
        Display the selectable options, allowing the client to choose between from different events to send. Supports the displaying of PowerUp in their color and tiles as coordinates Prints the other options using string methods.

  • setDisplayedPlayer

    public void setDisplayedPlayer​(ViewPlayer displayedPlayer)
    Set the displayed player, to display infos about other players
    Parameters:
    displayedPlayer - player that need to have his info displayed

  • refresh

    public void refresh()
    Refresh the current gameBoard, if clean is false. Print on the CLI:
  • the board itself
  • the players
  • the displayed player's powerups, weapon and ammos
  • the possible options to select
Specified by:
refresh in class View

    Parameters:
    color - to print the message in
    text - to print
    blocks - number of blocks to surround the message

  • disconnect

    public void disconnect()
    Print a message to indicates to the player his status of disconnected from the game. Set the status to END to notify the handler and communicate the possibility of a reconnection
    Specified by:
    disconnect in class View
